dialogueSegments.text: A customer! What can I get for you? Wait, welcome to the Seventino Midnight Cafe! I am Chef, your chef and barista!
dialogueSegments.speaker: Chef

dialogueSegments.text: I’d love to try that brew you have right there. The smell caught me while I was walking outside, it was hard to ignore. Alan, by the way. I haven’t ever seen this place before, is it new?
dialogueSegments.speaker: Alan

dialogueSegments.text: New to you, my friend, and that’s all the matters! This roast right here is actually my first attempt at a new recipe I’ve been perfecting. Care to be my trial run Alan?
dialogueSegments.speaker: Chef

dialogueSegments.text: Well if it tastes as good as it smells, I think that’ll be alright. What’s in it?
dialogueSegments.speaker: Alan

dialogueSegments.text: Oh, just a few ingredients from out in the wilderness! I know exactly what I need and how much of it I need. Sit tight, I’ll be back in a jif!
dialogueSegments.speaker: Chef

bestEnding.text: Here you go Alan! A coffee, brewed to perfection. What do you think?
bestEnding.speaker: Chef

bestEnding.text: I knew it smelled just like it… but it even tastes like it!
bestEnding.speaker: Alan

bestEnding.text: My mom’s coffee, back home. When I walked in earlier, what you were making smelled just like what my mom would make for my dad and I every morning before school.
bestEnding.speaker: Alan

bestEnding.text: We’d spend that little bit of early morning together, right as the sun peeks over the horizon. It was nice.
bestEnding.speaker: Alan

bestEnding.text: It sounds nice. I’m happy you enjoyed the coffee. Let me know if you ever want another.
bestEnding.speaker: Chef

bestEnding.text: I think I’ll take you up on the offer sometime. Thanks Chef. I’ll catch you around.
bestEnding.speaker: Alan

goodEnding.text: Here you go Alan! Thank you so much for waiting!
goodEnding.speaker: Chef

goodEnding.text: It tastes pretty good. Thank you for going out of your way to get the ingredients. I really appreciate it.
goodEnding.speaker: Alan

goodEnding.text: I’m happy you enjoyed the coffee. Let me know if you ever want another.
goodEnding.speaker: Chef

goodEnding.text: I think I’ll take you up on that sometime. Thanks Chef. I’ll see you later.
goodEnding.speaker: Alan
